title: The rights you might not realize you have - Shannon Odell

multiple-choice.question: In what year did the United Nations adopt the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR), the first international document outlining human rights?
What is the primary argument made by young plaintiffs in climate change lawsuits against their governments?

options.label: A
options.text: That governments are not doing enough to address economic inequality

options.label: B
options.text: That governments' inaction on climate change violates their basic human rights

options.label: C
options.text: That governments are not doing enough to address social injustice

options.label: D
options.text: That governments are not doing enough to protect the environment

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the document that outlines the inherent freedoms that belong to all people, regardless of their identity or location?

options.label: A
options.text: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR)

options.label: B
options.text: The Convention on Climate Change

options.label: C
options.text: The International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights

options.label: D
options.text: The Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples

multiple-choice.question: What was the significance of the Colombian Supreme Court ruling in favor of the young plaintiffs in 2018?

options.label: A
options.text: It marked the first time a court recognized the right to a healthy environment

options.label: B
options.text: It established that governments are legally obliged to reduce deforestation and greenhouse gas emissions

options.label: C
options.text: It set a precedent for similar cases in other countries

options.label: D
options.text: Both B and C

options.label: B
options.text: To promote economic growth and development

options.label: C
options.text: To reduce greenhouse gas emissions alone

options.label: D

options.label: C
options.text: It recognized the right to a clean, healthy, and sustainable environment as a universal human right
